title: Spa with 10-person spa tub, steam room, sauna & deck.
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 620 Sq.
McKenzie at 8th and Blanchard might as well be at the corner of Excitement & Access.
It’s so in the middle of everything that there’s no limit to what you can do and where you can go from that corner.
It's just steps to Whole Foods to stock up your fridge, or to gather supplies for a picnic in Seattle’s oldest park.
Grab a bike share and tool around Lake Union, or jump on the freeway and head to even greater outdoors.
Let the streetcar bring you blocks from the world’s greatest public market at Pike Place.
A home at McKenzie has all the ingredients for a life well-lived.
- Roof top dog spa & outdoor dog zone
- Fitness Center with pneumatic strength machines on the 39th floor
- Spa with 10-person spa tub, steam room, sauna & deck.
- 360-degree wrap around deck (1/10 of a km around) for views in all directions
- Yoga room with on-demand fitness programs
Located at 2202 Eighth Ave, between Bell st and Blanchard st
McKenize is a pet friendly community.
Our community offer pet owners a great space to relax.
Our 40th floor offer a dog run where your dog can enjoy the company of fellow dogs and enjoy the view.
Dog owners will enjoy a warm, glass enclosed seating area, where you can watch your pet play and enjoy views of the city and east towards the Cascade Mountains.
Our dog spa, is a great place to bring your pet when it's time for their bath and grooming session.
Our large tubs, and other services make it easy for you.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
